videos.headline: Corbin sneaks by defenders for 20-yard score
videos.description: Illinois' Reggie Corbin uses good footwork to weave through the defenders and reach the end zone for a 20-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Corbin sneaks by defenders for 20-yard score) 2019/10/26
